subject: p19757720
Findings: Monitoring and supporting devices are in standard positions. Bilateral, confluent, airspace opacities, right side more than left are unchanged since. As mentioned previously, these opacities are likely from combination of pulmonary edema, hemorrhage or pleural effusion. Enlarged heart size, mediastinal and hilar contours have similar appearance. Increased retrocardiac density reflecting left lower lung atelectasis is similar.
